title: Fake News Detection
description: NLP classification system to identify fake news articles using TF-IDF and PassiveAggressiveClassifier.

title: Netflix Content Analysis
description: Exploratory analysis and predictive models for Netflix titles (feature engineering, EDA, classification).

title: Sales Dashboard
description: Interactive sales analytics dashboard built with Dash and Plotly providing KPIs and rich visualizations.

title: House Price Prediction
description: Regression models and feature engineering for real estate price forecasting (linear models, tree ensembles).

title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
description: Comprehensive sentiment classification pipeline for tweets using TF-IDF, Naive Bayes, and SVM models.
